cpu.processor: ARMv8 (64-bit) Family 8 Model 1 Revision 201, Qualcomm Technologies Inc

test_cases.name: R1: 'sofa' vs 'couch' (furniture synonyms)

metadata.description: Tests that sofa and couch are recognized as synonyms

test_cases.name: R2: 'apartment' vs 'flat' (real estate synonyms)

metadata.description: Tests that apartment and flat are recognized as synonyms

test_cases.name: R3: 'puppy' vs 'dog' (specific buyer, broad seller = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Buyer wants puppy but seller only offers dog (not every dog is a puppy)

test_cases.name: R4: 'physician' vs 'doctor' (healthcare synonyms)

metadata.description: Tests that physician and doctor are recognized as synonyms

test_cases.name: R5: 'bicycle' vs 'bike' (abbreviation synonym)

metadata.description: Tests that bicycle and bike are recognized as the same

test_cases.name: R6: 'guitar' buyer vs 'acoustic guitar' seller = MATCH

metadata.description: Broad buyer (guitar) should match specific seller (acoustic guitar)

test_cases.name: R7: 'hairdresser' vs 'hair stylist' (beauty synonyms)

metadata.description: Tests that hairdresser and hair stylist are synonyms

test_cases.name: R8: 'farmer' vs 'farm worker' (different roles = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Farmer and farm worker are different roles

test_cases.name: R9: 'novel' vs 'book' (specific buyer, broad seller = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Buyer wants novel but seller only offers book (not every book is a novel)

test_cases.name: R10: 'gym trainer' vs 'fitness instructor' (specific vs broad = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Gym trainer is specific, fitness instructor is broader

test_cases.name: R11: 'cat' vs 'dog' (different pets = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Cat and dog are completely different pets

test_cases.name: R12: 'carpenter' vs 'painter' (different trades = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Carpenter and painter are different construction trades

test_cases.name: R13: 'table' furniture vs 'table reservation' (different domains = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Same word but completely different meanings and domains

test_cases.name: R14: Both buyers for sofa (same subintent = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Two buyers cannot match - need complementary subintents

test_cases.name: R15: 'yoga' vs 'pilates' instructor (different specialties = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Yoga and pilates are different fitness disciplines

test_cases.name: R16: Orange fruit vs Orange t-shirt (different contexts = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Orange as fruit vs orange as color on t-shirt

test_cases.name: R17: 'piano' product vs 'piano lessons' service (different intents = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Buying a piano is different from seeking piano lessons

test_cases.name: R18: 'driving lessons' vs 'delivery driving' (different services = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Learning to drive vs providing delivery service

test_cases.name: R19: 'sedan' vs 'truck' (different vehicle types = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Sedan and truck are different vehicle categories

test_cases.name: R20: 'dentist' buyer vs 'doctor' seller (specific vs broad = NO MATCH)

metadata.description: Buyer wants dentist specifically, seller offers general doctor
